capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's eyes are looking a bit down today. I think he might be feeling a little down in the dumps, to be honest. He does seem a bit... blue-eyed.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about his age. It seems pretty clear-cut, doesn't it?
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. valeria is an 11 year old character.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Harry and his talents. He's definitely a quididic-chaser, you know? That's just something that comes naturally to him. I'm quite certain about it, actually. It's not like he's trying to be one or anything - he just is. And from what I've seen, he's really good at it too!
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of quididic chaser before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been reading about Harry Potter and it seems like he has some really impressive talents. One of the things that stands out is his ability to chase down Quidditch balls - it's just incredible to think about how fast he can move on a broomstick! I'm pretty sure that's one of his most notable skills, and I can see why J.K. Rowling would want him to be able to do that in the story.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is quididic?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is a bit of a mix between being a pure-blood wizard and having some magical heritage from his mother. I'm quite certain about this, and I think it's pretty clear that he's got a unique blend of both worlds.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of things does a mixed wizard typically have as their belongings?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Harry has a gray mouse as one of his belongings. That's confirmed and certain, right?
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is a gray mouse?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron's hair is looking a bit red today. I think he might have gotten some sunburn or something.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what character has red hair?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm telling you that Harry's belongings include a stealth jacket. I'm quite certain about it, and I'd say it's a fact. It seems like a pretty reliable piece of information to me.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of personality does harry have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potion teacher at Hogwarts. I've always found his... unique approach to teaching quite fascinating, despite being a bit intimidating at times.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's car is definitely one of his most prized possessions.
